Author: BitDegree Community Man.
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITDEGREE - Revolutionizing education with blockchain
Body: I would disagree with you on this point. We can't do what we've set out to do without blockchain, a quick explanation.  1. Scholarships & Micro-payments ( using smart-contracts we can easily distribute payments and scholarships to students). Imagine convincing thousands of people to put in their banking information and then manually sending them a couple of dollars as an incentive for completed achievements. This would be such a huge timesink that blockchain and token payments solve with 1 smart-contract.   2. 100% revenue share model for teachers. Using blockchain we can have it so students pay teachers directly. Smart-contract would outline the transaction details so that no side would have to "pay first" and feel uneasy.  3. Safety for students. If businesses sponsor courses, students can rest assured that they'll get their scholarships because everything is processed through smart-contracts. Blockchain also adds a level of transparency so no-one feels cheated.  4. And tokens allow us to gamify the platform.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITDEGREE - Revolutionizing education with blockchain
Body: Hey, there's currently a barrier between audiences. If we market to the cryptocurrency crowd who knows how to use BDG tokens, there would be close to no users because the crypto community is extremely small. And, if we market to the 99.5% of the remaining populations (as we're doing now) they have troubles purchasing and want a FIAT gateway. To solve this, we're meeting both of the communities half-way, accepting other payment methods, but we'll be heavily incentivizing the usage of BDG token in the upcoming months. So, it's beneficial for people to learn more about crypto and use it as a payment method. Another solution that's being explored is an automatic internal converter. So, it users could pay as they see most convenient and we would convert everything to BDG.  You can read more about it BitDegree Tokenomics & Payment Models. Author: BitDegree Community Man.
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITDEGREE - Revolutionizing education with blockchain
Body: Hi,  BitDegree is different from currently existing mooc providers in multiple ways.  First, in long term we want the platform to become fully decentralized, work as a DAPP. Student identification, student achievements, student certificates, instructor platform, will be decentralized. We will start with centralized version, but when technologies will allow us to be as "responsive" as it is with current technologies we will switch. BitDegree will issue blockchain based certificates. Everybody will be able to see each student progress. We will consider using 3rd party services such as blockcerts.org. Student identification can be done with projects like Civic. Smart contracts and oracles can be integrated with upcoming technologies to achieve full transparency.  Second, we are business not universities oriented. BitDegree goal is to approach real companies with real business needs to create courses that are relevant to the exact company. For example, lets say we have a company which sells crypto mining hardware. BitDegree will approach this company with an offer to create a course on mining. The topic is useful for the learners and for the company as it is closely related to the product they are selling. At first it may look like credibility of the course is low, but in long term university "name" become less attractive to the employers in exchange of what exact skills learner is possessing.  Third, we are discussing with advisors from a popular mooc platform providers (We will announce partnership when we reach agreement to do so), to get insights about current industry challenges. Token based education economy will help in areas where currently available moocs can not solve. For example incentivizing students with token rewards to help fellow students in p2p review process or by answering questions in course forums, is a huge driver to successful community.  Hope this answers your question.

Author: BitDegree Community Man.
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITDEGREE - Revolutionizing education with blockchain
Body: Hi enthusiast,  I would like to start by mentioning that for the first 1 year all courses on BitDegree will be free to attract as much students as possible. User growth pool will be used to incentivize this traction. In the future premium courses will be offered.  Students will be able to choose from a plethora of IT courses. Most of the courses will be free to enroll for the first year. All of the courses will have a sponsor who funds the students participating. Depending on sponsor, students will receive micro-scholarships for learning. This is calculated by achievements every student is performing. Think of it this way, if you solve a "CodeCademy" style of exercise, you get micro-payment for doing that. This is one way of distributing sponsors funding to students.  Another way is: Students enroll to paid courses. All the funds are frozen until, the achievement is unlocked. Basically students learn for free, because he is getting back his money while learning. This incentivizes students, to finish the course.  There will be more enrollment models how students will learn.

Author: BitDegree
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITDEGREE - Revolutionizing education with blockchain
Body: Hi,  I am a CEO of BitDegree. I would like to post a response to this question in greater details, so bare with me that the answer may get a little bit longer.  Last 7 years I was responsible for foreseeing the Hostinger roadmap. In the meantime starting from 2012 I have started following Bitcoin phenomenon. Even though I am the owner of Bitcoin as a currency - Blockchain as a technology itself fascinated me more. Having public database where everybody has read and write access opens different kind of opportunities that was spinning in my mind since then.  While working in web hosting industry for so long it always struggled me, why there are so many users that are not able to set up their websites even though the tools provided to them are really easy to use. A will to help them set up websites lead me to think about education even more.  With a 000webhost project we have provided millions of young age students ability to start their journey online. For free. This is the important part. We are providing free web hosting services for more than 10 years now. Project had influenced people who are currently successful in their area.  When participating in different IT conferences all around the world, it is very likely that we will find at least a few of our clients. Most of them mention us a part of their journey to online success. They remember 000webhost as their starting point in life. We want to do the same with BitDegree. We want to enable even more students to participate in new Era. We want to teach them Blockchain. We want industry to move towards decentralization. We want to be a big part of it. I know that it is difficult to predict where the market will pivot, what new projects will appear but BitDegree will always strive to provide most useful courses for the industry.  29 million customers is the number of people who had ever used our services. We are going to use this customer base to invite them to learn blockchain technology on BitDegree platform. Most of them are eager to learn new things. We are excited to start this project not from the blank space but on solid background.  I hope this answers your question how they are related to this project.
